biotools.summary: EpigenCentral provides online analyses of epigenetic patterns related to diseases, intended for the broad biomedical community and clinical practitioners. Epigenetic disruptions play a key role in many congenital diseases, such as neurodevelopmental syndromes involving autism and intellectual disabilities.
